attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we know that that great company of woolworths and the loveable sheep&Dog,
get one of them great adverts back,
so what i would ask is that the Prime Minister, We need help with make this country Great again ??

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
